mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction (auction_id, product_id, start_price, current_price, end_time, status) VALUES (auction_seq.NEXTVAL, #{product_id}, #{start_price}, #{start_price}, TO_DATE(#{end_time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE auction SET start_price = #{start_price}, current_price = #{current_price}, end_time = #{end_time}, status = #{status}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bid (bid_id, auction_id, member_id, bid_amount, created_at) VALUES (bid_seq.NEXTVAL, #{auction_id}, #{member_id}, #{bid_amount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT p.product_id, c.category_name, r.region_name, product_name, a.current_price, a.status, p.thumbnail, a.auction_id, a.end_time, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bid b WHERE b.auction_id = a.auction_id) AS bidCount FROM auction a JOIN product p ON p.product_id = a.product_id JOIN product_category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN region r ON p.region_id = r.region_id
AND p.type = 'auction'
ORDER BY a.end_time ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.product_id, p.content, p.product_name, p.hitCount, p.likeCount, p.member_id, nickname, a.auction_id, a.current_price, a.end_time, a.status FROM product p JOIN auction a ON p.product_id = a.product_id JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE a.auction_id = #{auction_id}
SELECT bid_id, member_id bidder_id, nickname bidder_nickName, bid_amount, created_at FROM bid b JOIN member m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE auction_id = #{auction_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC
